Articles.Content:
Hi folks, I'm new to the forum but have been playing around in KSP for about a year. I've started using mods to get some interesting new parts and functionality (mainly because I hadn't had a gaming PC for a long time, so finally having the freedom to mod my games once more is kind of addictive!).

Here's a gallery - if I've worked imgur right - with some of my projects: the KSS, Minlab 01 and the KES Copernicus, which is the prototype for my long range explorers, I missed control wheels so it struggles to stick to markers (fortunately, there's enough monopropellent to nudge it back on course - the follow up has control wheels, a slightly adjusted layout and a bit more fuel).

https://imgur.com/gallery/ks8V2GU

Edited October 7, 2020 by Dork_Phoenix
Fancy ships and nice account name.

Hello @Dork_Phoenix and welcome to the KSP Forum!

Nice ships!

Glad to have you aboard.


Happy landings!
